title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published to npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) exposing Ollama models as LangChain LLMs & embeddings.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web)”
summary: Popular open-source web UI for Ollama with chat, model management, and RAG plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama (Maven Central: ollama4j) with Android support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic Ollama REST client and CLI helper.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (Rust) for interactive Ollama chats with syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin turning Ollama models into inline code copilots.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration (PyPI: ollama-haystack) to use Ollama models as generators & embedders.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying, fine-tuning, and extending Ollama.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stacks with GPU support, monitoring, and WebUI.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models to servers with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Python Slack Bolt bot exposing Ollama completions in channels and DMs.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware that proxies and caches Ollama endpoints for web apps.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that auto-detects local Ollama models and adds RAG toggles.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client (NuGet: OllamaSharp) with IAsyncEnumerable streaming and DI helpers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate (crates.io: ollama-rs) providing strongly-typed APIs and CLI examples.
